hero.headline: AI-powered platform for NCA, SAMA & PDPL audit-ready
hero.subhead: Saudi-native digital co-pilot for NCA, SAMA, and SDAIA/PDPL. One workflow from document upload to cryptographically signed regulatory export. AI validates evidence, suggests reuse across frameworks, locks audits for immutability, and keeps you portal-ready. Built for the Kingdom's requirements from day one.

trustSignals.title: Built for the Kingdom. Ready for your audit.
trustSignals.subtitle: NCA, SAMA, PDPL one platform. AI validates. You export.

badges.title: Essential Cybersecurity Controls
badges.desc: Run the criteria checklist, upload evidence, we map your data to NCA control IDs (e.g., ECC 2.2, 3.5). One-click export generates official .xlsx with domains, risk levels, and findings. Lock and sign the audit for immutable regulatory submission.

badges.title: Financial Sector Maturity
badges.desc: Select SAMA framework, link documents from Media Manager, run the audit. We validate evidence and export in official SAMA Excel format with maturity levels, executive summary, and digital signatures—ready for Central Bank portal submission.

badges.title: Data Protection & Privacy
badges.desc: Upload your privacy policies and consent evidence. We validate them against PDPL and keep one audit trail. Ready for SDAIA data protection audits.

frameworks.title: Built for the Big Three Saudi frameworks
frameworks.subtitle: NCA, SAMA, and SDAIA who makes the rules and who must comply

nca.name: NCA ECC-2024
points: Baseline security standard for the Kingdom; protects Critical National Infrastructure.
114 controls in 5 domains: Governance, Defense, Resilience, Third-Party & Cloud, and ICS.
ECC-2024 is tougher on cloud security, ransomware defense, and supply chain risk.

sama.name: SAMA CSF
points: Saudi Central Bank's Cyber Security Framework for financial sector stability.
Maturity model 0–5: Level 3 is the minimum pass; Level 5 is the gold standard.
Focus: fraud prevention, transaction security, and business continuity.
sama.for: Banks, insurance, fintechs, and financing companies.

sdaia.name: SDAIA / PDPL
points: SDAIA owns the Personal Data Protection Law (PDPL), the Saudi GDPR.
Key concept: consent. Audits require Privacy Policy, Consent Forms, and data evidence.
Focus: consent management, data subject rights, and breach notification.
sdaia.for: Everyone that collects, processes, or shares personal data.

items.title: Compliance dashboard
items.desc: One dashboard: see non-compliant audits, tasks assigned to the person fixing each finding, and audit completion status all in one place.

items.title: AI-generated reports
items.desc: Reports generated with AI include rich content: graphs, compliant vs non-compliant breakdown, scores per control, and full findings in the format regulators expect. One-click export to NCA and SAMA.

items.title: AI-assisted auditing
items.desc: AI copilot assists auditors in real time: suggests evidence from similar controls, detects compliance gaps before submission, validates evidence quality, and provides confidence scores reducing audit time and improving accuracy.

items.title: AI validation
items.desc: We don't just store documents we read them and flag missing SAMA/NCA requirements.

items.title: Framework harmonization
items.desc: Complete SAMA Control 3.3.5? AI automatically suggests reusing evidence for NCA ECC 2.2 using vector similarity search 70% less duplicate evidence collection across audits.

items.title: NCA ECC-2024 native
items.desc: Up to date with the latest controls.

items.title: SAMA maturity view
items.desc: See your level 0–5 and what's needed to reach Level 3 or 5.

items.title: Vision 2030 & Government Digital Transformation
items.desc: Arabic and English executive dashboards designed for Vision 2030 presentations and Kingdom digital transformation initiatives. Board-ready compliance reporting that aligns with Saudi Arabia's strategic objectives.

items.title: Audit locking & immutability
items.desc: Lock completed audits with cryptographic hash verification. Once locked, responses cannot be changed—ensuring audit integrity for regulatory submission and preventing tampering.

items.title: Digital signatures
items.desc: Auditors digitally sign locked audits with cryptographic verification. Every signature is timestamped and immutable ready for NCA/SAMA submission with full audit trail.

items.title: Pre-loaded templates
items.desc: Instant go-live based on your industry selection no months of consultant setup.

comparison.title: Why we stand out
comparison.tagline: Saudi-native from day one. One-click export, deep AI, no copy-paste.

rows.other: Scattered spreadsheets: no single view of non-compliant items or who's fixing what.
rows.us: One dashboard: non-compliant audits, tasks assigned to owners, and audit completion status.
rows.whyItMatters: See gaps and ownership at a glance, no chasing status in email or Excel.

rows.other: Manual report writing and copy-paste into regulator templates.
rows.us: AI-generated reports with rich content: graphs, compliant/non-compliant breakdown, scores per control, and full findings. One-click export to NCA and SAMA.
rows.whyItMatters: Audit completed, report generated with AI, graphs, scores, and everything regulators need, ready for submission.

rows.other: Auditor works alone with checklists and Excel.
rows.us: AI assists while the auditor works: suggests controls, flags gaps, maps evidence in real time.
rows.whyItMatters: Faster, more accurate audits, AI helps during the audit itself.

rows.other: Auditors copy-paste findings into government spreadsheets by hand.
rows.us: Official NCA and SAMA Excel/PDF templates with proper headers, domains, maturity levels, and digital signatures—ready for portal submission.
rows.whyItMatters: Minutes instead of days, no manual mapping, no portal rejections. Reports match official regulatory formats exactly.

rows.other: No audit trail verification; reports can be modified after completion; no digital signatures.
rows.us: Cryptographic audit locking with hash verification. Digital signatures from auditors. Immutable audit trail—no tampering possible after locking.
rows.whyItMatters: Regulator-grade audit integrity. Reports are cryptographically verified and signed, preventing any post-audit modifications. Essential for regulatory acceptance.

rows.other: Surface-level: checks dates and metadata only.
rows.us: Deep technical: reads evidence, maps to control IDs, recommends Mark Non-Compliant.
rows.whyItMatters: You get a Pre-Auditor that flags gaps before the regulator arrives, not after.

rows.other: Treated as an add-on or afterthought.
rows.us: NCA ECC-2024, SAMA CSF, and PDPL built in from day one.
rows.whyItMatters: No configuration, your industry determines the right frameworks.

rows.other: Months with consultants or weeks of custom config.
rows.us: Instant go-live based on industry selection. Pre-loaded templates, no consultant setup.
rows.whyItMatters: Audit-ready now, select your industry and you're live.

team.title: Leadership
team.subtitle: Building the digital infrastructure for Gulf enterprise

members.name: Kauser Jahan
members.bio: Leading ArabAudit with a vision to empower businesses across the Middle East through advanced AI and tailored SaaS solutions. With deep expertise in technology and a forward-looking perspective on the Saudi market, Kauser combines technical leadership with regional insight to help organizations achieve agility in the Kingdom's evolving digital landscape.

members.name: Abdul Sagheer
members.bio: CTO of ArabAudit, focused on building AI-native systems, cost-efficient infrastructure, and developer-first products. Passionate about solving practical problems with AI and shipping solutions that help Saudi enterprises move from audit panic to audit readiness.

members.name: Javeed Pasha
members.bio: CPO of ArabAudit, driving product strategy and user experience for Saudi compliance automation. Javeed shapes products that bridge the gap between complex compliance frameworks and practical enterprise needs, ensuring ArabAudit delivers intuitive solutions for NCA, SAMA, and PDPL readiness.

members.name: Zareen Taj
members.bio: COO of ArabAudit, overseeing operations and ensuring seamless delivery of compliance solutions across the Kingdom. Zareen drives operational excellence and scales processes to meet the growing demands of Saudi enterprises navigating NCA, SAMA, and PDPL requirements.
